events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, filing a claim for the damages sustained in the accident.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming the nature of the incident.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims was assigned promptly to provide assistance and guide the customer through the process.
Acknowledgment of the received claim was sent to the customer, outlining the next steps and what information will be required.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and the accident statement for further processing.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed images of the vehicle damage and an official police report.
The investigation team started reviewing all submitted materials and damage assessments to verify claim validity.
Investigation concluded confirming the claim circumstances and estimating the repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the damage evaluation and communicated to the customer for review.
The customer responded with appreciation of the timely responses and accepted the proposed settlement offer.
Formal approval was granted for the claim following customer agreement on the settlement amount.
The payment covering the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s designated account without delay.
The insurance claim was officially closed after confirming the customer’s satisfaction with the resolution process.
All claim files and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
